text: Raymond Joseph Robert Daviault (May 27, 1934 â€“ November 6, 2020) was a Canadian professional baseball player. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. In 1962, he played for the New York Mets. Daviault died on November 6, 2020 in Notre-Dame-de-la-Merci, Quebec at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Ray Daviault
